entries.name: dependencies
entries.desc: The dependencies of the gem for this specification

entries.name: name
entries.desc: The name of the gem for this specification

entries.name: platform
entries.desc: The platform this gem works on.

entries.name: set
entries.desc: The set this specification came from.

entries.name: spec
entries.desc: The Gem::Specification for this Resolver::Specification. Implementers, note that install updates @spec, so be sure to cache the Gem::Specification in @spec when overriding.

entries.name: version
entries.desc: The version of the gem for this specification.

entries.name: new()
entries.desc: Sets default instance variables for the specification.

entries.name: full_name()
entries.desc: The name and version of the specification.

entries.name: install(options = {})
entries.desc: Installs this specification using the Gem::Installer options.  The install method yields a Gem::Installer instance, which indicates the gem will be installed, or nil, which indicates the gem is already installed.

entries.name: installable_platform?()
entries.desc: Returns true if this specification is installable on this platform.
